sentence.text: A heterozygous nonsense variant was identified in negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, antagonist of protein polyubiquitination, 1 (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) via whole-exome sequencing in family members with imperforate anus, structural renal abnormalities, genitourinary anomalies, and/or ear anomalies.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II c.1256G>A;p.Trp419<sup>*</sup> variant segregated appropriately in the family consistent with an autosomal dominant mode of inheritance.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II is a member of the Wnt-signaling pathway, and epidermis development homozygous for null alleles display multiple congenital anomalies including absent anus with blind-ending colon and genitourinary malformations.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
